tool_description: Some search engines penalize your page ranking if they detect content that reads like it was entirely produced by AI. Evaluate your text with this tool before you publish your content.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-rewriter-to-avoid-ai-content-detector.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-rewriter-to-avoid-ai-content-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
